sentences.en: A pinhead is the head of a pin.
sentences.cn: 针头是指大头针的头部.

sentences.en: In electronics, the unidirectional, pinhead electron stream generated by the cathode gun in a CRT.
sentences.cn: 在电子技术中,由阴极射线管(CRT)中电子枪所产生的 、 单向细电子流.

sentences.en: It may even be possible to make computers the size of a pinhead one day.
sentences.cn: 甚至有一天计算机都可能做成钉头那样大小。

sentences.en: Jack is one of prime - seeing men in the office. Too bad he's like the a pinhead.
sentences.cn: 杰克是办公室最英俊的男子之一, 可惜他笨的要死.

sentences.en: The doctor fastens the pinhead with rubberized fabric.
sentences.cn: 医生用橡皮胶把针头固定下来.

trans.tran_cn: 大头针的平头，没有头脑的人
trans.tran_en: the small round part at one end of a pin
